Title: The Croods
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy
Writer: Chris Sanders (screenplay), Kirk DeMicco (screenplay), John Cleese (story), Kirk DeMicco (story), Chris Sanders (story)
Actors: Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone, Ryan Reynolds, Catherine Keener
Plot: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 44 nominations.
